p: In terms of vaccines, there are a large number of vaccination strategies against SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV being tested in animals, including a live-attenuated virus, viral vectors, inactivated virus, subunit vaccines, recombinant DNA, and proteins vaccines (1 1 6). Although, until now, there has not been any approved vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, several clinical trials have been launched for testing the effects of various vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
